long_description: The Exped Lite 125 Trekking Poles boast light weight that reduces strain on the arms without compromising stability while you make your way through the wilderness. 3-section DAC Featherlight NSL aluminum poles; twist-lock mechanisms. EVA extends below the grips, offering secure grip while traversing. The Exped Lite 125 Trekking Poles extend to 49 in. and collapse to 22 in.
short_description: The Exped Lite 125 Trekking Poles boast light weight that reduces strain on the arms without compromising stability while you make your way through the wilderness.
